about.heading: About Me
about.bio1: A passionate Fullstack Developer crafting elegant web interfaces with React, Next.js & TypeScript while building robust backend systems with Java, Spring Boot, Hibernate, Kafka, Redis & Microservices. I bring strong UI/UX skills, performance tuning, state management, and scalable architecture design.
about.bio2: If you're looking for someone who codes with purpose, bridges frontend and backend seamlessly, and delivers production-ready solutions — let's bring your ideas to life!

backend.title: Backend Development (Java / Spring Boot)
backend.description: Building scalable and reliable backend systems using Java & Spring Boot. Designing REST APIs, microservices architecture, and integrating MySQL, Redis, and Kafka.

microservices.title: Microservices & System Architecture
microservices.description: Designing and maintaining distributed systems with Spring Cloud, Kafka, and Docker. Implementing fault-tolerant, event-driven architectures for high-load applications.

database.title: Database Design & Optimization
database.description: Working with PostgreSQL and MySQL: schema design, query optimization, indexing, and database migrations with Flyway.

fullstack.title: Fullstack Development (React / Vue / Spring Boot)
fullstack.description: Developing fullstack applications with Spring Boot on the backend and modern frontend stacks (React / Next.js). Integrating them with responsive user interfaces.

details: Python, JavaScript, C#, algorithms & OOP fundamentals

highlights: Stateless API with optional stateful control via Redis — token invalidation in < 50 ms
Reduced DB queries by ~35–40% via Redis as distributed cache with TTL strategies
25+ REST endpoints, ~70% test coverage with unit & integration tests
Handles 300–500 req/min and 200+ active sessions with stable response time
JWT auth system with access + refresh tokens and session revocation logic
Spring Security with custom filters for per-request JWT validation and role-based access
Optimized DB transactions to reduce locks and simplify migrations
Configured Maven build profiles for dev/prod with integration tests
SEO-friendly code with valid markup and proper meta tags

frameworks.label: Frameworks
frameworks.value: Spring Boot, Spring Security, Spring Cloud, Hibernate
